document_data.name: ''Yeti Skin Cloak''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Yeti skin cloak''''' were [[enchanted]] [[cloak]]s that carried magical properties of [[yeti]]' pelt they were made of.
document_data.Powers: These cloaks granted the wearers resistance to mundane and magical cold.
document_data.History: ''Circa'' {{YearlinkName|1312}}, [[Oswald Fiddlebender]] crafted various magic items and clothing using pelts of yetis that plagued [[Icewind Dale]] Such yeti fur items were a great protection against harsh weather of the [[Frozenfar]]. Such clocks appeared as early as the {{YearlinkName|1281}}
